sentences.english: His library displayed miscellanea of mementos from different parts of the world, a lifetime of traveling.
sentences.chinese: 他书房里满是浪迹天涯时，搜罗来的世界各地纪念品。

sentences.english: He scoured the pots and pans and put away the milk and swept the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他搜罗坛坛罐罐和收起的牛奶，并包揽了厨房。

sentences.english: Who would not like to be a bargain hunter?
sentences.chinese: 谁不想做个搜罗便宜货的人呢？

sentences.english: Who wouldn’t dig Star Wars stuff?
sentences.chinese: 谁不会到处搜罗星战的小玩意呢？

sentences.english: So what are the rules of the talent-search game?
sentences.chinese: 那么，这场搜罗人才游戏的准则又是什么呢？

sentences.english: They scout for investment opportunities in America and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他们去美国和欧洲四处搜罗投资机会。

sentences.english: He raked up some first-rate players for our football team.
sentences.chinese: 他为我们的足球队搜罗到几个一流的运动员。

sentences.english: Selection of quality movies around the world.
sentences.chinese: 搜罗高质素的国际猛片。

sentences.english: They are trawling London for an agent.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在伦敦搜罗一个代理人。

sentences.english: It is a barain hunter who discovered the priceless violin.
sentences.chinese: 是一个搜罗便宜货的人发现了那把价值连城的小提琴。

sentences.english: Searching out the bleached bones of the image we found instead flesh unexpressed by light.
sentences.chinese: 搜罗漂白骨相，我们却发现光隐着的躯肉。

sentences.english: The reporter went on a fishing expedition about the president's involvement in the Iraq War.
sentences.chinese: 记者搜罗有关总统卷入伊拉克战争的新闻资料。

definition: to gather (people)/to collect (talent)/to come to an end
to rake in (money)/to plunder/to milk people dry
net for fishing or bird catching/(fig.) fetters/to snare (a valuable new team member etc)/to bring together under the one umbrella
to keep hidden/to keep in one's private possession/secret store/stash
lit. to catch everything in the one net (idiom)/fig. to scoop up the whole lot/to capture them all in one go
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
to rummage through/to turn everything over/to ransack
to arrange/to tidy up/to sort out/to straighten out/to list systematically/to collate (data, files)/to pack (luggage)
to collect/to compile/to converge/also written 彙集|汇集[hui4 ji2]
to purchase/to buy/to do one's shopping/purchasing agent/buyer
